restoreSystemDefaults: echo '█▓▒▒░░░ Starting System Restore to Default Settings ░░░▒▒▓█'; sleep 1; echo '--- 1. Restoring UI Animations & Touch Response ---'; settings put global window_animation_scale 1.0; settings put global transition_animation_scale 1.0; settings put global animator_duration_scale 1.0; settings put system touch.pressure.scale 1.0; settings put secure long_press_timeout 500; echo '[✔] Animations and touch settings returned to default.'; sleep 1; echo '--- 2. Restoring System & Scheduler Behavior ---'; cmd jobscheduler monitor-battery on; cmd device_config put activity_manager max_cached_processes 32; echo '[✔] Background process limit and scheduler restored.'; sleep 1; echo '--- 3. Restoring Power Management & Doze Mode ---'; dumpsys deviceidle enable; cmd power set-mode 1; settings put global low_power 0; settings put global performance_mode 0; settings put global stay_on_while_plugged_in 0; echo '[✔] Doze mode re-enabled, power mode set to balanced.'; sleep 1; echo '--- 4. Restoring Dynamic/Adaptive Refresh Rate ---'; settings put secure user_refresh_rate 0; settings put system min_refresh_rate 60; settings delete system peak_refresh_rate; settings delete global min_fps; settings delete global max_fps; settings put system display.disable_dynamic_fps 0; settings put global dfps.enable true; settings put global smart_dfps.enable true; settings put global fps.switch.thermal true; echo '[✔] Refresh rate set to Automatic/Dynamic.'; sleep 1; echo '--- 5. Resetting GPU & Game Driver Settings ---'; settings delete system game_driver_power_saving_mode; settings delete system game_driver_gpu_mode; settings delete system game_driver_fps_limit; setprop persist.sys.gpu_perf_mode 0; setprop debug.performance.profile 0; setprop debug.hwui.disable_vsync false; echo '[✔] GPU and Game Driver settings reset.'; sleep 1; echo '--- 6. Restoring Default Network Settings ---'; setprop net.ipv4.tcp_timestamps 1; setprop net.ipv4.tcp_tw_reuse 0; echo '[✔] Network stack settings returned to default.'; sleep 1; echo '--- 7. Re-enabling System Logging ---'; setprop persist.log.tag ''; settings put global anr_debugging_setting 1; echo '[✔] System logging re-enabled.'; sleep 1; echo ''; echo '█▓▒▒░░░ RESTORE COMPLETE ░░░▒▒▓█'; echo '>>> A device REBOOT is highly recommended to ensure all settings are fully restored. <<<'
utilityRamClean: echo '█▓▒▒░░░ Standard RAM Clean ░░░▒▒▓█'; am kill-all; sync; dumpsys meminfo --clear-all-caches; echo '[✔] RAM cleaned.'; echo '█▓▒▒░░░ COMPLETE ░░░▒▒▓█'
